name: Bounce Box - for HTC Vive
description:
Bounce Box is a Breakout inspired VR game made for the HTC Vive. The player throws balls to destroy brightly colored cubes and has a square shield to block rebounds. There are three levels and to clear them you break all cubes. 

This is my first game. I chose a Breakout-style game because I figured I could handle the mechanics and thought it would be fun to turn a classic flat game into something more kinetic and physical.

This game has not really been play-tested. I'm very interested in suggestions and feedback. Thanks for your interest and I hope you enjoy Bounce Box!
